title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1806.8 - Waiver/modification
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1806.8 - Waiver/modification

State Regulations

The commission may, in its discretion, waive or modify any
of the requirements of this or any other part of its regulations if the
essential purposes set forth in section
1806.2
of this Part continue to be
served. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1806.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
